titles.title: Keep up the song of faith

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Keep up the song of faith, However dark the night; And as you praise, the Lord will work To change your faith to sight.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Keep up the song of faith, And let your heart be strong, For God delights when faith can praise Though dark the night and long.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Keep up the song of faith, The foe will hear and flee; Oh, let not Satan hush your song, For praise is victory.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Keep up the song of faith, The dawn will break ere long, And we shall go to meet the Lord, And join the endless song.
